cui_name: Mucinous tubular and spindle cell carcinoma
reasoning: Mucinous tubular and spindle cell carcinoma (MTSCC) is a rare renal cell carcinoma subtype, comprising <1% of RCC cases. Estimated incidence <0.05 per 100k based on case series and pathology reviews. Limited epidemiological data from population-based registries.
source: Srigley JR et al. (2013). WHO/ISUP classification of renal neoplasia. Am J Surg Pathol. 37(10):1463-1484
